summary: The former members of a dance troupe are suing because of recently published memoirs. Each one insists on own point of view.
cast: Gene Kelly|Mitzi Gaynor|Kay Kendall|Taina Elg|Jacques Bergerac|Leslie Phillips|Henry Daniell|Patrick Macnee|Stephen Vercoe|Philip Tonge|Richard Alexander|Gordon Armitage|Frank Arnold|Brad Brown|Barrie Chase|Lilyan Chauvin|Gene Coogan|Adrienne D'Ambricourt|George Davis|Marcel De la Brosse|Wilkie de Martel|George Dee|Cyril Delevanti|Claire Du Brey|Billy Griffith|Colin Kenny|Maurice Marsac|Owen McGiveney|Gregor Momdjian|Alberto Morin|George Navarro|Nestor Paiva|Genevieve Pasques|George Pelling|Francis Ravel|Geoffrey Steele|Gilchrist Stuart|Arthur Tovey|Lusita Triana|Maya Van Horn
title: Las girls
